dict.string: That book will come in handy. You put it in your pack.
You head to the door and exit the room.
Would you care to start an exciting text-based adventure? Tap once to begin.
You wake up in your bed. Type LOOK to see what's around you.
Type the name of the object to put it in your pack or use it. Type LOOK to survey the area.
You're in a dark room. A book lies in front of you. I wonder what it says...
You're at the waterfront. You see a boat in front of you and an island in the distance.
You made it to the island. A sparkling chest glimmers in front of you.
The book is full of hints! The first hint says: use the boat to get to the island.
You jump in the boat. It magically starts to move! It's taking you to the island.
